questions.question:
Given:
Distance from A to B 1200 NM
GS On 230 kt
GS Home 170 kt
What is the distance and time to the PET from "A"?
questions.explanation: PET distance = (Total Distance × GS Home) / (GS On + GS Home) = (1200 × 170) / (230 + 170) = 204000 / 400 = 510 NM. Time = 510 / 230 = 2.217 hours = 2 h 13 min.

questions.question:
Questions 6, 7 and 8 are engine failure cases
Given:
GS On 300 kt
GS Out 350 kt
GS Home 250 kt
Distance from A to B 1200 NM
What is the distance and time to the PET from "A"?
questions.explanation: For engine failure PET: Distance = (Total Distance × GS Home) / (GS On + GS Home) = (1200 × 250) / (300 + 250) = 300000 / 550 = 545.45 NM ≈ 545 NM. Time = 545 / 300 = 1.817 hours = 1 h 49 min.

questions.question:

questions.explanation: GS On (2 engines) = 450 + 50 = 500 kt, GS Out (1 engine) = 350 + 50 = 400 kt, GS Home (1 engine) = 350 - 50 = 300 kt. questions.question: Given an actual time of departure (ATD) of 11:05, what is the ETA for the PET?
questions.explanation: From question 9, PET distance = 204 NM. Time to PET calculated from GS On. ATD 11:05 + time to PET = ETA at PET = 11:55.
